title: Benefits of Magnesium
hook: Did you know magnesium affects 300+ body functions?
mainPoints: Improves muscle recovery|Reduces cramps and fatigue|Supports better sleep
conclusion: That's why BILAN uses magnesium glycinate

title: 8 Glasses Myth
myth: You need 8 glasses of water per day
truth: Your hydration needs depend on activity level
explanation: Athletes can lose 1-2L per hour. Plain water isn't enough - you need electrolytes.

title: Pre-Workout Hydration
tip: This ensures optimal sodium levels during your workout

title: POV Real Hydration
hook: When you realize plain water isn't enough
duration: Working out without electrolytes|Feeling tired and cramping|Trying BILAN for the first time|Crushing your workout

title: Sodium and Performance
hook: Most athletes don't get enough sodium

title: Salt is Bad Myth
truth: Sodium is essential for athletes and active people
explanation: Your body loses sodium through sweat. Without replacement you risk hyponatremia.

title: Post-Workout Recovery
explanation: Replenish electrolytes within 30 min of finishing
tip: This accelerates recovery and reduces soreness

title: Morning Routine Upgrade
scenes: Starting day with plain water|Adding BILAN to your routine|Feeling energized all morning|Never going back

title: What Are Electrolytes
hook: They're minerals that conduct electricity in your body
mainPoints: Sodium - fluid balance|Potassium - muscle function|Magnesium - 300+ reactions

title: Hydration for Hot Days
explanation: Double your electrolyte intake in hot weather
tip: Heat increases sweat rate and electrolyte loss dramatically
